segments.text: Why did you choose Applied Sociology as your major ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think Applied Sociology is a practical subject that can be widely applied to research on soci-ety and man . Hence , I chose it as my major .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you taken the course in Public Relations when you are in college ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sorry to say I haven't , but I have taken many other courses that concerns the PR , such as Social Psychology , Public Affairs and Mass Communication .
segments.speaker: S2
